rukus.text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va rasulas imon ovardaed va ʙa sari'ati U amal kardaed, cun azoni namozi ruzi cum'a gufta savad, ʙa sui zikri Alloh ʙa gus kardani xutʙa va adoi namoz ʙisitoʙed va xaridu furusro va tamomi korhoe, ki sumoro az on masƣul mesozad, tark kuned. Agar ʙidoned, in dasturoti farmudasuda ʙarojaton ʙehtar ast

Pas cun xutʙaro sunided va namoz ʙa oxir rasid, az paji rizqu ruzi dar zamin parokanda saved va az rizqi Alloh talaʙ kuned va Allohro ʙo dilu zaʙon va dar hama hol ʙisjor jod kuned, ʙosad, ki dar dunjovu oxirat rastagor saved

Va cun ticorate jo ʙozie ʙinand, ʙa'ze az musalmonon parokanda mesavand va ʙa coniʙi on meravand va turo ej Pajomʙar ʙar minʙar istoda raho kunand? Bigu: «On ci dar nazdi Alloh az podosi ʙuzurg ast az ʙozivu ticorat ʙehtar ast». Va Alloh ʙehtarini ruzidihandagon ast, pas az U talaʙi rizqu ruzi kuned va ʙo to'ati U madad cued az xajri dunjovu oxirat
